template.name: Google Document
template.description: Create and share documents on the web and access them from any computer or smart phone. The familiar desktop feel makes collaborative editing easy.
template.text:
1. Open document here.
2. Near the "Share" button press arrow and select "Publish to the web".
3. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
4. Add width="100%" height="100%" inside iframe tag.

template.name: Google Spreadsheet
template.description: Create and share spreadsheets online. Google spreadsheets makes it easy to track budgets, run financial calculations, track data and more.
template.text:
1. Open spreadsheet here.
2. Near the "Share" button press arrow and select "Publish as a web page".
3. Press "Start publishing".
4. At the "Get a link to the published data" page select "HTML to embed in a page".
5. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
6. Add width="100%" height="100%" inside iframe tag.

template.name: Google Calendar
template.description: Organizing your schedule shouldn't be a burden. With Google Calendar, it's easy to keep track of life's important events all in one place.
template.text:
1. Open calendar here.
2. Under "My calendars" press "Settings" and select calendar.
3. Copy embed code from "Embed This Calendar" section and paste it here.
4. Add width="100%" height="100%" inside iframe tag.
5. You can also customize the color, size, and other options.

template.name: Picasa Slideshow
template.description: Fast and easy photo sharing from Google. Share with friends and family, or explore public photos.
template.text:
1. Open album in your Picasa account.
2. Press "Link to this album" at the right.
3. Press "Embed Slideshow".
4. Select slideshow size.
5. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
6. Resize module to fit selected size.

template.name: Google Maps

template.text:

4. Select map size.
5. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
6. Resize module to fit selected size.
